title: Give us back the club
body:
Still waiting for Riot to respond to this issue. 
Give. Us. Back. Our. Club.

> An account which owns a club got perma banned, and because banned accounts can't even use the client (flawless design as always, chalk this up next to the champion collection redesign) the club can't be managed anymore, and they cannot transfer ownership.

~~Riot ~~Tencent sure is good at completely wiping users from the platform. Or at least they are thorough. 
Pity they suck at everything else.
